item.name: Backpack
item.description: * In combat, draw and place a card from the top of your deck into the Backpack. * If the card is The Tower, draw a new card and shuffle The Tower back into your deck. * Any time during your turn, you may swap a card in your hand with the card on Backpack.
item.flavor: This sturdy rucksack is perfect for whatever you need to carry.
